name: Hellborn Unraveling
desc:
Horrific power emanates from your palm into a 5 foot wide, 90 foot long line. The first creature in the path of the line must make a Constitution saving throw or take 4d6 fire, 4d6 unholy, and 4d6 arcane damage, halved on a success. If the creature is reduced to 0 or fewer hit points, it is obliterated with an unearthly screech, and the spell continues to the next creature in the line. If a creature is not obliterated, the spell ends without going any further.

Any creature damaged by the spell has all spell effects instantly dispelled. The line dispels all spell effects it travels through.
empower: Before the creature makes a saving throw, it takes 3d6 arcane damage.
